name: First Person Hockey
description:
I always wanted to play a sports game where it was individual-based; where you didn't focus on the entire team but instead played as one player. This game is the result. 

"First Person Hockey" is a hockey game in which the user has a first person perspective of a hockey player and must try to win points by juking out the other team. Players can play solo matches by themselves or test out their puck skills  against a friend in two player mode.
